name: Dream o'BeepBop
description:
You are a little robot named BeepBop and you must clean the factory with your bubble gun and find the sheep that causes all this mess ! 

A little game made in two weeks with the theme : "Do androids dream of electric sheep ?".

Credits : Heard Mathieu, Jorand Raphael, Le Mao Charlélie, Le Mercier Diane, Pivaudran Antoine, Ratton Marc
